tAUTER BACH
INPORTANT NORES
The following are the instructions for emergency evacuation procedures used at
the la Guardia stevardess emercency evacuation meetings December 16, 17, and 18.
Please read t these notes carefully and keep than so that you may reviow them from
tine to time,
INSTRUCTIONS I0 ESSENGERS
1. LADIES AND GENTLEMEN: I have something very important to say to you, so
pleas liston carofully to everything I say, and do exactly what I tell you,
We are going to make an enorgency landing at
will have to act quickly.
Straighten up your cat
_in 10 minutos, 30 wo
backs,
Renove your eye
glasses and any sharp objects such as pens and pencils, from your pockets
and remove your high heeled shoes.
Place these in the seat pocket in front
or your
Passengers in aisle seats reach above you and take down blankets and
pillows to cover your face and head to protect then frog injury.
Then fasten
your seat belts and kep the lastened until the plane has cone to rost.
will bo two impacts, the first when we hit the ground; the second when the
plane stops its forward novenent.
It is important, renember, keop your seat
belts fastened until you feel the second impact and the plane has stopped,
After the plane stops, unfasten your belts and go to the nearost exit.
Beside
the main cabin door, there are exits here and hero (point to these exits-
change this according to whore you are standing and which cabin you aro in).
If you go out over one of the wings,
propellers and land on your feat.
sit down and slide off, avay from the
Help othere if you can, otherviso got out
of tho mo ne or res ad Doro so possiolo.
INSTRUCTIONS TO MEN DELEGATED TO FBLE
A. Pick two non for cach exit and sover then quickly to these exite. Instruct
them all nt one if possiblc and rive instructions before vindows arc opened.
B.
Whon plane has stopped complotoly, second impact, unfasten your bolts.
Don't
unfasten than bofore that becauso you are important to the safe evacuation
of al1 these other people and we can't afford to have you injured. Then climb
OUG on the wing, one foot first,
last.
then hand and shoulders.
Pull other foot out
Stay at window exit on wing and help others out.
Tell then how to get
through window and so that they sit dow and slide. Koop then away fros
propellers, The second nan out will slide off tho wing and remain at the
edge to catch othere ne thou
off.
Any other men willing to help once
you are outside, pleaso reaiin at those cxit positions. Start a second line
sliding off cach wing.
Help poopie slide by giving then a gentle push and
help the man on the cround te catch poople and get them out of the way quickly
Pick two (four if you have tine) non to sit close to the main cabin door.
(I
would prefor to have one in 11D and one in 128 or on the stowardess jump seat.
Two other good seats are gb and u.
Keep 11C for the First Stewardess
and
9B or C for Stewardess or 13 or C - deponding upon the corrency. bather of
those positions would place her whore sho could pot outside quickly and bo of
moro assistance if nocessary.)
The two non closest to the door should go out first, do the slide, hand over
hand, etc, etc.
ZINAL PREPARATION BBFORE IANDING
If time pemits after those men are instructed, then got them to stow 10030
